mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK) VALUES ( #{productName},#{productDescription},#{productPrice},#{productStock})
mapper.select:
SELECT TP.PRODUCT_ID, TP.PRODUCT_NAME, TP.PRODUCT_PRICE, TP.PRODUCT_READ_COUNT, TP.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE, TI.IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME FROM TBL_IMAGES TI INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TP.PRODUCT_ID = TI.REFERENCE_ID AND TI.IMAGE_TYPE = 'PRODUCT'AND TI.MAIN_IMAGE = 'Y'
AND TP.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY TP.PRODUCT_READ_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY TP.PRODUCT_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY TP.PRODUCT_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY TP.PRODUCT_CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY TP.PRODUCT_ID DESC
